_meanings:
{@--1@} ({%a%}) 
Consecration for a religious ceremony, 
initiation in general; <ls>R. 3. 44</ls>, <ls n="R. 3.">65.</ls>
({%b%}) Receiving the initiatory {%mantra%}.

{@--2@} A ceremony preliminary to a
sacrifice.

{@--5@} Dedicating
oneself to a particular object, 
selfdevotion.

a 
supplementary sacrifice made to atone for
the defects in a preceding one.
